mapper.sql: id , baseunitid, name, yearid, parentid, budgetflag, pids, managers, createtime, budgetdepts, budgetusers, orderno, unittype, ccratioformula, preccratioformula, revenueformula, updateagentflag, calculatesubjectflag, submitflag, submittime, submitorid, submitorname, updatetime, requeststatus, verifytime, verifystr, verifyorid, verifyorname, remark
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, DISPLAY_NAME FROM wb_user
SELECT DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, DEPT_FULLNAME FROM wb_dept

SELECT us.yearcontrolflag, us.lendflag, us.revenueformula, us.preccratioformula, us.ccratioformula, us.formula, us.subjectid, us.hidden, us.monthcontrolflag, us.yearsubjectcontrolflag, us.splitflag, us.addflag FROM budget_unit_subject AS us WHERE us.unitid = #{unitId};

SELECT sub.name, sub.name text, sub.formula, sub.procategoryid, sub.id, sub.id subId, sub.costsplitflag, sub.costaddflag, sub.costaddflag addflag, sub.costlendflag, sub.costlendflag lendflag, sub.parentid, sub.jointproductflag productagentflag, cate.name catename, sub.formulaflag, sub.leafflag FROM budget_subject sub LEFT JOIN budget_product_category cate ON sub.procategoryid = cate.id WHERE 1=1 AND sub.stopflag = 0 AND sub.yearid = #{yearId} ORDER BY sub.orderno

SELECT _subject.* FROM budget_subject _subject WHERE _subject.id IN (SELECT _unitsubject.subjectid FROM budget_unit_subject _unitsubject WHERE _unitsubject.unitid = #{unitId}) AND _subject.procategoryid IS NOT NULL

SELECT product.*, category.pids, category.fullname categoryname FROM budget_product product INNER JOIN budget_product_category category ON product.procategoryid = category.id WHERE product.stopflag = 0
and (category.id in (${cid}) or category.pid in (${cid}))
AND product.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
ORDER BY product.orderno

SELECT * FROM budget_unit WHERE managers is not null
AND CONCAT(',',managers,',') LIKE CONCAT('%,', #{userId}, ',%')

SELECT bu.id id, bu.baseunitid baseUnitId, baseunit.name baseUnitName, bu.name, bu.yearid yearId, yp.period yearName, bu.parentid parentId, if(bu.budgetflag, 1, 0) budgetFlag, bu.pids, bu.managers, bu.budgetdepts budgetDepts, bu.budgetusers budgetUsers, bu.orderno orderNo, bu.unittype unitType, bu.remark, bu.ccratioformula ccratioFormula, bu.revenueformula revenueFormula FROM budget_unit bu INNER JOIN budget_year_period yp ON bu.yearid = yp.id LEFT JOIN budget_base_unit baseunit ON bu.baseunitid = baseunit.id WHERE bu.yearid = #{yearId} ORDER BY bu.parentid, bu.id

SELECT bu.id id, bu.baseunitid baseUnitId, baseunit.name baseUnitName, bu.name, bu.yearid yearId, yp.period yearName, bu.parentid parentId, if(bu.budgetflag, 1, 0) budgetFlag, bu.pids, bu.managers, bu.budgetdepts budgetDepts, bu.budgetusers budgetUsers, bu.orderno orderNo, bu.unittype unitType, bu.remark, bu.ccratioformula ccratioFormula, bu.revenueformula revenueFormula FROM budget_unit bu INNER JOIN budget_year_period yp ON bu.yearid = yp.id LEFT JOIN budget_base_unit baseunit ON bu.baseunitid = baseunit.id WHERE bu.yearid = #{yearId} ORDER BY bu.parentid, bu.id
SELECT id,name FROM budget_unit WHERE yearid = #{yearId}
